# googleforms_sheets_conditional_format_rule (Resource)

Manages a Google Sheets conditional format rule. Note: Rules are addressed by index and can be affected by out-of-band edits.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `index` (Number) 0-based rule index within the sheet's conditionalFormats array.
- `rule_json` (String) JSON encoding of a Sheets ConditionalFormatRule object.
- `sheet_id` (Number) Sheet/tab ID (sheetId).
- `spreadsheet_id` (String) Target spreadsheet ID.

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Composite ID in the format spreadsheetID#sheetId#index.
